title: Big square
text: It's so spacious surounded wuth neoclassical buildings. There are 14 figures that present leaders of Hungarian people.

title: Big stone bridge
text: This bridge is first stone bridge made on Danube river over all of its lenght. Hungarians have covered itvin light when the daylight goes by so it's a wonderful bridge to see when walking on a Danube river bank.

title: Very emotion waking site
text: It's been very nice ti visit this site. It's located near the Hungarian parliament. It's a memorial site made to remark the victims of Nazi's crimes against humans.

title: Big and complex building
text: Haven't been inside but we took a danube river boat tour and at night all important buildings are covered by rays of light making them look marvelous. It's complexity is stunning and resolution of details is incredible.

title: Great hotel with a perfect locatiin
text:
The hotel itself is on a great location, 100 meters from one of Hungary's most famous squares, Heroes square. Metro line is located at the very beginning of Andrassy avenue which leads you to the center in couple of minutes. Tickets are a bit tricky to get mostly because ticket window does not work on every station.
A classic room has 2 beds, a TV without usb input, so everyone bringing media on USB won't be able to have a movie night before sleep. Room is equiped with a chair and a spacious workdesk. Shower cabine is nice and clean, big enough for 2 persons. Rooms are clean and so are walls. Bathroom also has a hair dryer with integrated socket for a shaving machine and 2 towels. You are also included a breakfast wich is very basic with some traditional meals like sauces, sousages, cgeese, ham and various spreads.
Room also has a safe for personal belongings and a big enough wardrobe.

title: Beautiful but crowded
text: The parthenon itself is very nice, but it is very crowdy and taking a photo can be challenging, besides it's popularity the acropolis is a place to chill.

title: Great restsurant, slow service
text: It was nice, has a big balcony on top but the staff is very slow and it takes some tome to get you order.

title: Great beach!
text: Just what we expected, nice sunrise, long sand beach with a great panoramic view. Great place to rest and enjoy yourself.

title: Excellent food and service!
text: I would recommend this restaurant to everyone planning to visit or pass by Lloret de mar! Food was very delicious as the staff was very polite and helpful! I would reccomend meal n. 23 and 24. View of the beach from the balcony is also a reason why you should visit this awesome place!
